environmental_hazard_index.long_description: Based on the Environmental Hazard Index, It combines 12 variables from EPA EJScreen 'UST , DSLPM, CANCER, RESP, PTRAF, PWDIS, PNPL, PRMP, PTSDF, OZONE, PM25, PRE1960PCT.' PCA (oblimin rotation) is carried out on the Z scores of each of the variables. The PCA output is standardized.
environmental_hazard_index.short_description: Based on the Environmental Hazard Index, it examines the risk of exposure to environmental pollution.
environmental_hazard_index.statement: The environmental hazard index in {features.name} is {value}.
